spec.name: Cyber Tech
spec.subtitle: Self-Improvement at Any Price
spec.description: The Cyber Tech explores the realm of medicine using technical and biological know how to craft and maintain cybernetics, as well as to integrate them into living bodies. Given this ability to skillfully alter bodies with cybernetics, most Cyber Techs perform at least some upgrades on themselves. The degree and subtlety of an individual Cyber Tech's upgrades tend to depend on the individual's culture, species, and personal beliefs. Within some cultures, extensive cybernetic augmentation is considered unusual or even taboo.

talents.name: Cyberneticist
talents.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Cyberneticist from checks to build, repair, and install cybernetic implants. Cybernetics cost 50% less.

talents.name: More Machine than Man
talents.description: Increase cybernetic implant cap by 1 per rank of More Machine than Man.

talents.name: Engineered Redundancies
talents.description: Gain the ability to use emergency repair patches to heal. Additionally, can be healed with Mechanics checks.

talents.name: Toughened
talents.description: Gain +2 Wound Threshold

talents.name: Eye for Detail
talents.description: After making a Mechanics or Computers check, may suffer strain up to ranks in Eye for Detail to convert that many Success to Advantage.

talents.name: Toughened
talents.description: Gain +2 Wound Threshold

talents.name: Energy Transfer
talents.description: May suffer 1 strain to use the Energy Transfer maneuver to power up an unpowered devie or replenish exhausted ammunition for an energy weapon.

talents.name: Cyberneticist
talents.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Cyberneticist from checks to build, repair, and install cybernetic implants. Cybernetics cost 50% less.

talents.name: Overcharge
talents.description: Once per encounter, may use the Overcharge action: make a Hard Mechanics check, on success, one installed cybernetic provides additional benefits. On Despair, overchanged cybernetic shorts out.

talents.name: More Machine than Man
talents.description: Increase cybernetic implant cap by 1 per rank of More Machine than Man.

talents.name: Durable
talents.description: May reduce any Critical Injury suffered by 10 per rank of Durable to a minimum of 1.

talents.name: Surgeon
talents.description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional wound per rank of Surgeon.

talents.name: Improved Overcharge
talents.description: May spend 2 Advantage or 1 Triumph from Overcharge action to immediately take another action.

talents.name: Utility Belt
talents.description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to perform a Utility Belt incidental: produce a previously undocumented item or weapon (with restrictions) from a tool belt or a satchel.

talents.name: More Machine than Man
talents.description: Increase cybernetic implant cap by 1 per rank of More Machine than Man.

talents.name: Surgeon
talents.description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional wound per rank of Surgeon.

talents.name: More Machine than Man
talents.description: Increase cybernetic implant cap by 1 per rank of More Machine than Man.

talents.name: Durable
talents.description: May reduce any Critical Injury suffered by 10 per rank of Durable to a minimum of 1.

talents.name: Supreme Overcharge
talents.description: May perform the Overcharge action on any number of installed cybernetics. On Despair, 1 overchaged cybernetic shorts out.

talents.name: Dedication
talents.description: Gain +1 to a single characteristic. This cannot bring a characteristic above 6
